document.full_text: bahrain has suspended its flights to and from lebanon a day after it warned its nationals not to travel there following declarations of support by iranian-backed shi'ite group hezbollah for protests by bahrain's shi'ite.
document.title: bahrain suspends lebanon flights as sectarian tension rises
lines_and_colors: bahrain has suspended its flights to and from lebanon a day after it warned its nationals not to travel there following declarations of support by iranian-backed shi'ite group hezbollah for protests by bahrain's shi'ite.
